thread.title: Excellent hotel in great location
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in great location - Review of Hotel le Tourville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Edward B
title: Excellent hotel in great location
text:
This is the second time we have stayed in the Tourville hotel and it has been excellent both times. Friendly welcome from the staff and the location is perfect, round the corner from a Metro stop and within walking distance of the Eiffel Tower.
Room Tip: Great Location See more room tips
